title: The British Josiah: Edward VI-- the most Godly king of England
description: 2001, trade paperback edition, SMF Press, St. Louis, MO. 208 pages. Nicely written title about a king that "history forgot." He was termed as "an angel in a human body." The young prince was trained in the ways of God and would ultimately act against the many problems that his nation underwent at the time of his reign.
author: N.A. Woychuk
